snippet: Sweet desserts in Turkey are both an important feature of daily life and an entrenched part of religious and secular rituals. (Article plus video.)
abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column shares recipes for Turkish flour helva, pistachio baklava and Turkish burned milk pudding.
lead_paragraph: Sweet desserts in Turkey are both an important feature of daily life and an entrenched part of religious and secular rituals. (Article plus video.)

headline.main: Turkish Sweets Are the Essence of a Nation
